ðŸ“– Summary: Yank Note is a highly extensible Markdown editor designed for productivity. It offers features like version control, AI copilot integration, mind map support, document encryption, code snippet execution, an integrated terminal, chart embedding, HTML applets, Reveal.js presentations, plugin support, and macro replacement, aiming to provide a comprehensive Markdown editing experience.
